title: Ep 11: Soup Duped Dick Dumbed
itunes:title: Ep 11: Soup Duped Dick Dumbed
description: In this episode Shannon and AG give you insight to the highly anticipated Soup diet. Shannon breaks down what a “Horse Girl” is and her childhood memories of operating a mechanical bull at age 11. The girls dive in to what a sugar baby consists of and AG reveals her experience as one herself… allegedly? The streets have officially taken a sharp turn and Shannon is in need of Triple A. The girls discuss how to take your power back in a situation where you just feel confused. When is it appropriate to ghost someone, if ever? What salad was AG eating when she witnessed a homicide? All of these answers and more on Episode 11: “Soup Duped Dick Dumbed”
